data.comment: The match is underway in Puebla.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Emanuel Gularte is booked for the home team.
Leon have a goal kick.
In the minute 5, Puebla awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Puebla to take a throw-in in Leon territory.
In Puebla Puebla drive forward through Christian Tabo. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 6, Corner awarded to Puebla.
Throw-in for Puebla close to the penalty box.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards Leon a goal kick.
In the minute 7, Ball safe as Puebla is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Puebla.
Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 10, Can Puebla get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leon's half?
Throw-in for Puebla in their own half.
Emanuel Gigliotti of Leon gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 14, It's a goal kick for the home team in Puebla.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Fernando Navarro for Leon who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 18, Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Leon in the half of Puebla.
Free kick Leon.
In the minute 19, Leonâ€™s Fernando Navarro is on his feet again at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
Free kick for Puebla in their own half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a Puebla throw-in in Leon's half.
In the minute 22, Emanuel Gigliotti gets his shot on target but fails to score for Leon.
Osvaldo Rodriguez for the away team is judged to be offside.
Throw-in for Puebla at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
In the minute 23, Puebla to take a throw-in in Leon territory.
Santiago Ormeno of Puebla smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Puebla have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
In the minute 24, Puebla have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
Can Leon capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Puebla's half?
Can Leon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Puebla's half?
In the minute 25, In Puebla a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Leon are coming forward and Jean Meneses gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Puebla goal kick.
In the minute 27, Throw-in Leon.
Goal kick for Puebla at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
Throw-in for Puebla in the half of Leon.
In the minute 30, It's a goal kick for the away team in Puebla.
Free kick for Leon in the half of Puebla.
Puebla's Javier Salas misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 35, Ball goes out of play for a Leon goal kick.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a Puebla throw-in in Leon's half.
Can Puebla capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 36, Santiago Ormeno (Puebla) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards Leon a goal kick.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 40, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Osvaldo Martinez is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 45, Leon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Puebla.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
In the minute 45, Puebla to take a throw-in in Leon territory.
Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Leon have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
Osvaldo Martinez, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Omar Fernandez is the substitute for Puebla.
The second half has started at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
Throw-in Puebla.
In the minute 47, Leon will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Puebla.
Puebla are pushing forward but Santiago Ormeno's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Leon at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
In the minute 48, Ball safe as Puebla is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Leon in the half of Puebla.
Puebla drives forward and Santiago Ormeno gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 52, Corner awarded to Puebla.
Puebla have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Goal! Leon have got their heads in front thanks to a Emanuel Gigliotti strike.
In the minute 53, Great play from Osvaldo Rodriguez to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Puebla in the half of Leon.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Leon at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a Leon throw-in in Puebla's half.
In the minute 57, Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Puebla goal kick.
Puebla pushes forward through Santiago Ormeno, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 60, Corner awarded to Puebla.
Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Leon's Osvaldo Rodriguez misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 61, Goal kick for Puebla at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick Puebla.
In the minute 62, Juan Reynoso is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Cuauhtemoc with Daniel Alvarez replacing Pablo Gonzalez Diaz.
Jean Meneses of Leon is pulled up for offside.
Santiago Ormeno's header is off-target for Puebla.
In the minute 63, Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards Leon a goal kick.
At Estadio Cuauhtemoc, Luis Montes has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Osvaldo Rodriguez for Leon gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 66, It's a goal kick for the home team in Puebla.
Leon take a comfortable 0-2 lead thanks to Angel Mena.
That's a fine assist from Emanuel Gigliotti.
In the minute 71, Leon have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Puebla in their own half.
Leon are coming forward and Luis Montes gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 72, Ball goes out of play for a Puebla goal kick.
Puebla awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Leon in their own half.
Puebla's Santiago Ormeno is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 73, Santiago Ormeno is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In Puebla a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 74, Leon are down to 10 men after Pedro Aquino has been shown a red card.
Nicolas Sosa is replacing Angel Mena for Leon at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
Amaury Escoto is replacing Emanuel Gularte for the home team.
In the minute 77, Daniel Alvarez (Puebla) heads in to reduce the deficit. The score is now 1-2.
George Corral instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in for Leon in their own half.
Can Leon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Puebla's half?
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Leon.
In the minute 82, Marcos Ignacio Ambriz (Leon) is making a second substitution, with Joel Campbell replacing Emanuel Gigliotti.
In the minute 83, Puebla awarded a free kick in their own half.
Puebla to take a throw-in in Leon territory.
Leon drive into the zone and Joel Campbell is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
In the minute 84, It's a goal kick for the home team in Puebla.
Free kick for Puebla in their own half.
Important block from the Leon defence as Omar Fernandez fires in a strike for Puebla.
In the minute 87, Maximiliano Perg (Puebla) has received a yellow card from Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
Corner awarded to Leon.
Leon have a goal kick.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Puebla close to the penalty box.
Puebla have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
Goal kick for Leon at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Puebla just outside Leon's area.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards Leon a goal kick.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez blows to end the match. The final score is 1-2.
Nicolas Sosa (Leon) has received a first yellow card.
The away team have replaced David Ramirez with Andres Mosquera. This is the third substitution made today by Marcos Ignacio Ambriz.
Fidel Daniel Ambriz Gonzalez is on a sub for Jean Meneses for Leon.
